function NPC_113081:Init(NPCID) --[[ User Data 1: 2: 3: Pain누적 데미지 --]]
NPC_ReserveUserData(NPCID, 3);
local MaxHP = 70000 NPC_113081.BufIdHellFlame = 40140
NPC_113081.MinionIdArcher = 113105 NPC_113081.MinionIdKinight = 113106 end
function NPC_113081:OnSpawn( Info ) --GLog( "OnSpawn" .. NPC_113081.BufIdHellFlame .. "\n" ) this:GainBuff( NPC_113081.BufIdHellFlame ) end
function NPC_113081:OnFinishSummonArmy( ThisNPC, Enemy ) end
function NPC_113081:OnStartSummonArmy( ThisNPC, Enemy ) ThisNPC:NarrationNow( ThisNPC:GetName() .. "가 죽은자들을 불러들입니다." ) NPC113081_SummonArmy( ThisNPC, Enemy ) end
function NPC113081_SummonArmy( ThisNPC, Enemy ) local Dir = Enemy:GetFowardDir( ThisNPC ) local Points = Math_GetPolygonPoints( ThisNPC:GetPos(), Dir, 400, 5 ) local Minions = { NPC_113081.MinionIdKinight, NPC_113081.MinionIdArcher, NPC_113081.MinionIdArcher, NPC_113081.MinionIdKinight, NPC_113081.MinionIdKinight }
local WorldPos = vec3() local Field = ThisNPC:GetField()
for i = 1, 5, 1 do AsNPC(ThisNPC):Summon( Minions[i], Points[ tostring(i) ] ) end end
